name: Fallen Star (Krel113)
description:
A mini narrative cards game / visual novel taking place in a Lovecraft world. 

You're the king and you must make decisions to protect your realm from ruin.

To do so, hold down the arrows key (right or left) corresponding to the chosen decision.

Be careful, though. Your choice may affect the stability of the kingdom, and if it falls to zero, that's game over.

Good luck!

CLICK ON THE WEB WINDOW TO ENABLE YOUR KEYBOARD.

Game design and game programming: Krel113

Music : Darren Curtis and Alexander Nakarada (free musics)
